name: One More Time (BOTAlex)
description:
What if time was a resource?

One More Time is an endless rouge-like where time is a KEY resource. Theme - What if Time is a resource? Join Clock Boy on his endless adventure to get more time and destroy his enemies. Buy guns for time, But be careful not to run out of time! If the time runs out, your life will be cut short. 

  • Thrilling Gun Play! 
  • Randomly Generated Levels! 
  • Mind Bending Machine Learning Technology! (Source: Trust me bro)
  • Infinitely Replayable Gameplay! 
  • Insane Boss Battle! Outstanding Lighting Effects! 
  • Jaw-Dropping Visuals and Clarity! 
  • Seamless Transitions! 
  • Marvelous Cutscenes! 
  • Ice Cream --> 冰淇淋!
